bodyContent.text: Car and Trailer Storage at MC3

Our outdoor storage facility in Upper Hutt provides straightforward, 24/7 access with convenient entry from SH2. Ideal for Wellington and Hutt Valley customers needing secure motorhome, caravan, or trailer storage, itâ€™s a practical base between trips with flexible month-to-month pricing from $150 per month including GST.

faqs.a: MC3 is located in Upper Hutt, New Zealand. Follow our website and social channels for opening hours and events, or simply to stay in touch.

faqs.q: Does MC3 have security lighting and cameras?
faqs.a: Yes, we operate 24/7 around the clock surveillance. Call us about storing your vehicle, boat, caravan, or motorhome today.

faqs.q: Do I have 24/7 access to my vehicle?
faqs.a: Yes, we provide secure access to a gated and fenced compound with 24/7 access to authorised persons.

faqs.q: How much will it cost to store my vehicle?
faqs.a: We calculate cost based on the area of your vehicle (length x width) to determine a monthly rate.

faqs.q: What payment options does MC3 accept?
faqs.a: We invoice monthly and accept online banking transfers. GST Invoices are sent on the first day of each month and cover storage until the last day of the month.
